description: A comprehensive testing suite covering all three MCP servers: docs-mcp, coderef-mcp, and personas-mcp. Includes unit tests, integration tests, and performance tests organized as a complete package.
goal: Test docs-mcp, coderef-mcp, and personas-mcp servers comprehensively with organized, maintainable test structure

Performance tests for speed and resource benchmarks
constraints: Tests should be maintainable and well-documented
Cover critical paths in each server
